products.title: Stirlo Primrose Yellow
products.description: Stirlo primrose yellow plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow
products.description: Konya blackout primrose yellow plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Infusion Asc Muted Gold Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc muted gold perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.
